publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3762 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Civic Government (Scotland) Act 1982 (Licensing of Skin Piercing and Tattooing) Order 2006—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Civic Government (Scotland) Act 1982 (Licensing of Skin Piercing and Tattooing) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon*

S2M-3762 Mr Tom McCabe: The Draft Civic Government (Scotland) Act 1982 (Licensing of Skin Piercing and Tattooing) Order 2006—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Civic Government (Scotland) Act 1982 (Licensing of Skin Piercing and Tattooing) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: George Lyon
